<h3 id="X24217">X(24217)&nbsp;=&nbsp; (A,B,C,X(2); A',B',C',X(1)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(45), WHERE A'B'C' = ANTICEVIAN TRIANGLE OF X(514)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2 b - a b^2 + b^3 + a^2 c + 3 a b c - b^2 c - a c^2 - b c^2 + c^3 : :
